name: Katherine Hooker [Shopify]
blurb: A luxury fashion storefront built from a heavily customized Shopify Impulse theme. Bespoke Liquid templates, advanced filtering, Swiper.js galleries and custom CSS animations.
keyFeatures: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Shopify Liquid, Figma
Bespoke Liquid templates from Figma designs
Swiper.js galleries and custom CSS animations
